title: Christian Brand
text:
Christian Brand (born 23 May 1972) is a German <a href="Association%20football">football</a> coach and former player.
Career.
A <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a>, Brand began his career at VfB Oldenburg and made his debut for the club on 27 August 1991 in a match against <a href="FC%20St.%20Pauli">FC St. Pauli</a>. In his first season Brand played 13 games as Oldenburg narrowly missed out on promotion, finishing in second place behind <a href="Bayer%20Uerdingen">Bayer Uerdingen</a>.
Coaching career.
After retiring from football, Brand became the new assistant manager of <a href="FC%20Thun">FC Thun</a> in the summer 2007. On 7 January 2008, he was appointed as a youth coach of the <a href="FC%20Luzern">FC Luzern</a>. 
After the former coach <a href="Rolf%20Fringer">Rolf Fringer</a> was sacked on 2 May 2011, he was named caretaker manager of the Luzern first team and will be replaced by <a href="Murat%20Yakin">Murat Yakin</a> at the end of the season.
He was appointed as the head coach of <a href="SSV%20Jahn%20Regensburg">SSV Jahn Regensburg</a> on 18 November 2014.
He was appointed as the head coach of <a href="F.C.%20Hansa%20Rostock">Hansa Rostock</a> on 7 December 2015. He was sacked on 13 May 2017.
